Publications

Towards developing a learning analytics dashboard for a massive online robotics competition

IEEE
This research discusses a dashboard developed for a robotics competition where team characteristics are considered for clustering teams and developing models to predict participants' retention and help the competition's instructors monitor their progress and intervene if necessary.
Link to IEEE Xplore
2022

SPArK-Bot: An Educational Robotic Platform

IEEE
This paper reports the development and explains the features of a highly versatile educational robot focused on teaching beginner-friendly programming and robotics.
Link to IEEE Xplore
2022

Auto-Query - A simple natural language to SQL query generator

IEEE
The study explored ways to develop an application that takes questions in a natural language and converts them into SQL queries using a sequence-to-sequence model for an e-learning platform.
Link to IEEE Xplore
2022
